title: 关于plugin.yml的小问题
author: Windowsredstone
txt_content:
我希望在一个插件中调用多个API，我应该怎么做？

是

depend: [PlaceholderAPI, Vault]
depend: [PlaceholderAPI; Vault]
depend: [PlaceholderAPI], [Vault]
depend: [PlaceholderAPI]; [Vault]复制代码?

replies.author: AlbertBlue
replies.txt_content: 没记错应该是第一种depend: [PlaceholderAPI, Vault]

replies.author: Windowsredstone
replies.txt_content:
Lightning_Reed 发表于 2019-8-16 14:58
没记错应该是第一种depend:
谢谢!
